attributes.action: Award all NHS staff and all care workers with 1 month extra annual leave.
attributes.additional_details: Please add us 1 month extra annual leave that as least we could rest.
attributes.background:
As from beginning of Covid-19 situation Parliament didn’t accept pay rise for all of us working on the front line please allowed us for 1 month extra annual leave .
We are all overwhelmed and exhausted.
It would be really appreciated if instead of pay rise at least you will add extra holidays .

rejection.details:
The NHS are responsible for decisions about annual leave for NHS staff, not the UK Government or Parliament. Similarly, individual local authorities or care providers are responsible for decisions about annual leave for their staff.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513

Award all nursing staff in the NHS pay rise of 10%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307
